- This option is available because your current specialisation study might be §Rbugged§! (it was not automatically cancelled after reaching max level).
- If you independently noticed your new specialism slot and §Yrestarted studying within the last 1-2 years§!, then §Ythis warning is probably a false positive which can be safely ignored§!!
- If you take this option and have an available specialisation slot, you can §Yimmediately§! restart studying a specialisation (via intrigue menu decision, in the Guild submenu).
- If your specialisation study was NOT bugged after all and you restart immediately, you will NOT lose any progress.
- If you do NOT choose this option but later come to believe that your specialism study may be bugged, you can reset it as follows: cancel studying (via the Guild submenu), wait for the cooldown to expire, and restart.
